access: You are from Dongun Hold or Alkenstar.
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dongun Education](/Feats.aspx?ID=3282) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Dwarf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=54" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 200</row>

**Access**
You are from Dongun Hold or Alkenstar.

</column>

---

You're knowledgeable in trades that are important to your people's survival and commercial interests. Pick two of the following [Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) skills: Engineering Lore, Explosive Lore, or Firearm Lore. At 2nd level, you gain expert proficiency in these Lore skills; at 7th level, you gain master proficiency in these Lore skills; and at 15th level, you gain legendary proficiency in them.
